SELECT kindergarten_name, address, y_coordinate, x_coordinate FROM kids_normal_now WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY x_coordinate LIMIT #{start}, #{end}

SELECT knn.office_education, knn.kindergarten_name, knn.kindergarten_type, knn.address,
knn.hearder, knn.director, knn.birth, knn.start, knn.tel, knn.home_page, knn.operating_hours, knn.class_count_3, knn.class_count_4, knn.class_count_5, knn.class_count_mix, knn.class_count_special, knn.students_max_total, knn.students_max_3, knn.students_max_4, knn.students_max_5, knn.students_max_mix, knn.students_max_special, knn.students_now_3, knn.students_now_4, knn.students_now_5, knn.students_now_mix, knn.students_now_special, knn.y_coordinate, knn.x_coordinate,
kca.classroom_count, kca.area_classroom, kca.area_gym, kca.area_clean, kca.area_cook, kca.area_etc,
ksm.management_method, ksm.management_company, ksm.students_total_count, ksm.students_meals_count, ksm.dietitian_check, ksm.dietitian_single_count, ksm.dietitian_multi_count, ksm.dietitian_multi_name, ksm.chef_count, ksm.cook_count, ksm.catering_report_check,
kas.start_time, kas.end_time, kas.class_independent_count, kas.class_afternoon_count, kas.class_total_count, kas.students_independent_count, kas.students_afternoon_count, kas.students_total_count, kas.teacher_regular_count, kas.teacher_temporary_count, kas.teacher_Dedicated_count, kas.teacher_total_count,
ksi.play_goods_check, ksi.play_goods_check_date, ksi.play_goods_check_result, ksi.cctv_have, ksi.cctv_in, ksi.cctv_out, ksi.cctv_total,
kc.car_check, kc.car_active_total_count, kc.car_report_total_count, kc.car_9, kc.car_12, kc.car_15,
ktc.total_teacher_count
FROM kids_normal_now knn LEFT JOIN kids_classroom_area kca ON knn.kindergarten_name = kca.kindergarten_name AND knn.address = kca.address LEFT JOIN kids_school_meals ksm ON knn.kindergarten_name = ksm.kindergarten_name AND knn.address = ksm.address LEFT JOIN kids_after_school kas ON knn.kindergarten_name = kas.kindergarten_name AND knn.address = kas.address LEFT JOIN kids_safety_inspection ksi ON knn.kindergarten_name = ksi.kindergarten_name AND knn.address = ksi.address LEFT JOIN kids_car kc ON knn.kindergarten_name = kc.kindergarten_name AND knn.address = kc.address LEFT JOIN kids_teacher_count ktc ON knn.kindergarten_name = ktc.kindergarten_name AND knn.address = ktc.address WHERE knn.kindergarten_name = #{kindergarten_name} AND knn.address = #{address}
